data.comment: Today's referee, Vasiliy Kazarcev, has blown to start the match.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Tambov.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Tambov at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 8, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Volgograd's Kamil Mullin fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Volgograd.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 11, In Volgograd Volgograd attack through Ilya Zhigulev. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Tambov at Zenit Stadium.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Tambov's half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Tambov.
In the minute 15, Mikhail Kostyukov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tambov.
Free kick Volgograd.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Volgograd.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Tambov.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a throw-in for Volgograd, close to Tambov's area.
In the minute 22, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Ilya Zhigulev is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Tambov at Zenit Stadium.
Tambov's Valeriu Ciuperca gets in a shot on goal at Zenit Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Volgograd a goal kick.
An attacking Volgograd player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 26, Tambov's Varazdat Haroyan has been booked in Volgograd.
Zurab Davitashvili (Volgograd) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Volgograd are awarded a penalty at Zenit Stadium. Zurab Davitashvili takes the kick ... But misses!
In the minute 28, Volgograd attack but Ilya Zhigulev's header doesn't find the target.
Tambov have a goal kick.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Volgograd.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Tambov's half.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Sergey Makarov (Volgograd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
Flamarion for Volgograd drives towards goal at Zenit Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Zurab Davitashvili (Volgograd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 42, Tambov have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
Kamil Mullin of Volgograd gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At Zenit Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Tambov.
Tambov have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Zenit Stadium.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
The away team have replaced Guram Tetrashvili with Aleksandre Karapetian. This is the first substitution made today by Sergey Pervushin.
In the minute 46, Anton Kilin is replacing Aleksey Rybin for the away team.
In Volgograd Volgograd drive forward through Flamarion. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 49, Tambov needs to be cautious. Volgograd have an attacking throw-in.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
Throw-in for Tambov close to the penalty box.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Volgograd a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Aleksandre Karapetian gives Tambov a 0-1 lead.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Volgograd.
In the minute 60, Throw-in high up the field for Volgograd in Volgograd.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Tambov.
Valeriu Ciuperca (Tambov) has received a first yellow card.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Aleksandr Khatskevich is making the team's first substitution at Zenit Stadium with Andres Ponce replacing Ilya Zhigulev.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Flamarion is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 67, Flamarion returns to the field for Volgograd after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in Volgograd.
The match at Zenit Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Aleksandre Karapetian, who is down injured.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Sebastien Thill (Tambov) has replaced the possibly injured Aleksandre Karapetian at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
German Onugha (Tambov) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Attention is being given to Tambovâ€™s Mikhail Kostyukov and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 73, Mikhail Kostyukov has recovered and rejoins the match in Volgograd.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
Volgograd are pushing forward but Zurab Davitashvili's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 76, Tambov have a goal kick.
Volgograd make their second substitution with Beka Mikeltadze replacing Zurab Davitashvili.
Mikhail Kostyukov (Tambov) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Vladimir Kabakhidze.
In the minute 77, Evgeniy Pesegov is on a sub for Sergey Makarov for Volgograd.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
Goal kick for Tambov at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 79, Free kick Volgograd.
In Volgograd Volgograd drive forward through Flamarion. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 81, Volgograd's Flamarion misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Volgograd.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Goal! German Onugha extends Tambov's lead to 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Sebastien Thill.
Flamarion for Volgograd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Tambov at Zenit Stadium.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Volgograd's Oleg Aleynik gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Free kick for Tambov in the half of Volgograd.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Tambov.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
Danil Stepanov (Volgograd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Vladimir Kabakhidze (Tambov) has received a first yellow card.
Vitali Shakhov is replacing Pavel Karasev for Tambov at Zenit Stadium.
